#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{
    long long int n,q,a[100001],min,max,t;
    scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&q);

    for(long long int i =0 ;i < n; i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
        if(i == 0)
        {
            min = a[0];
            max= a[0];
        }
        else{
            if(a[i] < min)
                min = a[i];
            if(a[i] > max)
                max = a[i];
        }

    }
    while(q--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&t);
        if(t<= max && t >= min)
            printf("Yes\n");
        else
            printf("No\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
